She is asking for help from Kiva because she believes that education is indispensable for progressing.  She also wants to serve customers and help the community.  This is why she selected this career field, which fits her personality and vocation.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Mabel

texts.en:
This borrower is 60 years old and married with adult children who take care of themselves. She makes a living selling rice. Her business is located at her residence. She has a lot of customers because of the business location. She uses the profits she makes to help pay the household costs that arise.

The borrower wants to buy more rice in order to stock her business. She is able to do this with the profit she makes from her sales, so she is asking for a loan to buy more from the market and sell to customers. Then she can make better profits and continue to help her family.

loans.use: To buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Aliou

texts.fr:
Monsieur Aliou, âgé de 35 ans, évolue dans le domaine de la pêche depuis tout jeune, à 15 ans, il accompagnait déjà son père en mer. Aliou est marié à trois femmes et est père de 11 enfants dont 6 avec la première, 4 avec la deuxième et 1 avec la troisième. Son ainé de tous a 15 ans.
Aliou possède  trois pirogues et 3 machines. Il commence sa journée s’il doit aller en mer, à 10h et reviens vers 17h. Aliou a une grande famille, et il les nourrit de son activité de pécheur en dépensant 8 750f par jour. Néanmoins il a un bénéfice de 15 000f par jour et par pirogue après déduction des frais.
Ayant deux terrains, il a comme vœu de les construire et de mettre sa famille dans de meilleures conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Aliou, 35, has been in the fishing business from a very young age. At 15 years old, he was already accompanying his father to the sea. Aliou has three wives and has a total of 11 children: six with his first wife, four with his second wife, and one with his third wife. His oldest child is 15 years old.

Aliou has three canoes and three machines. If he needs to go to the sea, he starts his day at 10 AM and comes home around 5 PM. Aliou has a large family, and he feeds them with his fishing business spending 8,750f a day. Nevertheless, he makes a profit of 15,000f a day for each of his canoes after expenses.

He wishes to build and have two locations and to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a diving suit for his fishing business

loans.name: Abdou Kosso

texts.fr:
Abdou Kosso, est un jeune commerçant qui s’active dans la vente de céréales depuis maintenant quatre ans. Il est célibataire sans enfant et vit avec sa mère. Il achète sa marchandise vers la zone sud du pays. Il ratisse des villages environnants à la recherche des denrées à moindre coût. Il peut mettre au moins 8h de temps pour obtenir ce qu’il veut. A son retour, il met une demi-journée pour livrer la marchandise à ses clients. 
Vu la quantité de ses commandes, il sollicite un crédit de 600 000F CFA pour l’achat de céréales comme le mil, le maïs et l’arachide.
Pour ses charges, il donne 25 000F à sa mère avec qui elle vit.
Abdou Kosso crois fermement à la terre et à l’agriculture et s’il avait les moyens, il exploiterait ses 4 hectares.
texts.en:
Abdou Kosso is a young shopkeeper who has been selling cereals for four years now. He is single, has no children, and lives with his mother. He buys his merchandise near the southern zone of the country. He looks in the surrounding villages searching for foodstuffs at a lesser cost. He can spend at least 8 hours getting what he wants. Upon his return, he spends half a day delivering his merchandise to his customers. 

Given the quantity of his orders, he is requesting a loan of 600,000 FCFA to buy cereals such as mil [African cereal], corn and ground nuts. 

For his responsibilities, he gives 25,000 F to his mother with whom he lives. 

Abdou Kosso strongly believes in the earth and in agriculture and if he had the means, he would exploit his 4 hectares.

loans.use: to buy cereals (mil, corn, ground nuts) to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more belts for her business.

loans.name: Agustín Jaime

texts.es:
Agustín de 37 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está casado, tiene una hija con su actual pareja, y dos hijos mayores con su esposa anterior, que viven en los Estados Unidos de América, por tanto solo su hija menor depende de él. 

Agustín a sus 16 años de edad, se fue para los Estados Unidos, en busca del ansiado “sueño americano”, estando allá, trabajó por mucho tiempo construyendo techos en casas, hace 5 años lo deportaron a este país, su tierra natal, fue entonces aquí donde conoció a su actual esposa. 

Él trabaja en una fuerte ganadería de la zona, ahí se desempeña actualmente en diversas actividades, correspondientes a la ganadería, como lo es el ordeño, la limpieza de las instalaciones y el equipo, alimentar a los animales entre otros. También se dedica a hacer viajes de transporte pesado, en un camión que adquirió su esposa. 

El préstamo que Agustín solicita, es para pintar un carro que le regalaron desde Estados Unidos, él pretende venderlo para obtener ganancias, para ello necesita pintarlo para que el carro tenga una apariencia adecuada y alguien esté en la disponibilidad de comprarlo.

Agustín sueña con que el mayor de sus hijos cumpla veintiún años de edad, para así obtener la ciudadanía norteamericana y volver a Estados Unidos a juntarse con sus hijos y también espera llevarse a su esposa y a su hija junto con él.
texts.en:
Agustín, who is 37 years old, went to school up to ninth grade. He is married and has a daughter with his current wife and two older children from a previous marriage, who live in the United States of America, so only his youngest daughter depends on him.

Agustín went to the United States when he was sixteen in search of the sought-after "american dream." While he was there, he worked building roofs for houses for a long time, but five years ago he was deported back to this country, his homeland, where he met his current wife.

He works for a well-established ranch in his area and currently has different ranching duties like milking the cows, cleaning the facilities and equipment, feeding the animals, and other tasks. He also works offering heavy transportation services with a truck that his wife purchased.

Agustín will use the loan he is requesting to paint a car that he received as a gift from the United States. He intends to sell it to make a profit, and for that he needs to paint it so that the car looks presentable and someone might be willing to buy it.

Agustín's dream is for his oldest son to turn 21 years old so that he can become a US citizen and return to the United States and reunite with his children. He also hopes to take his wife and daughter with him.

loans.use: to buy paint to paint his car.

loans.name: Kosar

texts.en:
Kosar is a 32 year-old married woman operating a business, selling milk, for the past 10 years. She has two buffaloes that provide milk. She sells it to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to give her a decent life.

She has four children, with one child in school. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business and is able to meet day to day expenses of life. 
 
This is her third year with Kashf Foundation and she is happily running her business with their support. Now she is requesting a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo and to buy feed for her animals. She hopes to increase her production capacity which will ultimately help in generating more income.

loans.use: To purchase one more buffalo and feed for her animals

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 35 years old. She is married with six children. She runs a restaurant and has been in the business for the past six years. With this loan, she would like to buy more sodas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for her family. Vestine says: "the last loan, helped a lot to boost my business".

loans.use: to buy more crates of soda to sell.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe SABOUGNOUMA est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 41 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TINGOLE, commune de TINGOLE préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font la restauration, le commerce de condiment, de savon, et d’encens. Les femmes du groupe SABOUGNOUMA sont à leurs dixièmes prêts solidaires. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recourt à SORO YIRIWASO. 
La cliente BINTOU  la première personne à partir de la gauche n’est pas instruite, elle est actuellement vendeuse d’encens depuis 4 ans. Elle compte acheter 5 kg de grain d’encens magnokissèni, 4 kg de guéni, 2 boites de bogue, 4 boites de mari Diana, et 4 flacons de parfum eau de Cologne et des bouteilles vides chez les grossistes à Bamako. Ainsi, elle les transforme en encens de qualité (déodorant traditionnelle woussoula). La vente se fait en espèce à une clientèle mixte chez elle et parfois ambulante. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 22 000Fcfa par mois, qui sera en partie injectés dans l’activité et le reste dans l’élevage de petit ruminant.
texts.en:
The Sabougnouma group is composed of married women. On the average, they are 41 years with five children. They all live in traditional families in the village of Tingole, Tingole municipality, Dioila prefecture, Koulikoro region (the second administrative region of Mali).
They know each other as relatives, neighbors and friends. They sell cooked dishes, condiments, soap and incense. The group members are on their second solidarity loan. With the goal of meeting huge customer demand, they have turned to Soro Yiriwaso.

Our client Bintou, the first one on the left in the photo, did not attend school. She has been working as an incense vendor for four years. She plans to buy five kg [11 lbs] of “magnon kissèni” plant used for making incense, four kg [nine lbs] of guéni" [a sweet-smelling root], two boxes of the Bogue brand perfume, four boxes of [a different perfume brand?], four bottles of eau de cologne and some empty bottles from wholesalers in Bamako. She will then proceed to make traditional high-quality “woussoula” or "wussula" incense. She sells for cash, out of her home and sometimes as a street vendor, to a mixed clientele. She plans to earn a monthly revenue of 22,000 West African francs, part of which will be reinvested in her incense business, and the rest used for raising small livestock.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients for making incense.

loans.name: Kolamban Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe KOLAMBAN est composé de femmes mariées elles ont en moyenne 46 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de WEREKELA, commune de GUEGNEKA préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de condiment, de savon, de charbon, de tubercule, et d’article divers. Les femmes du groupe KOLAMBAN sont à leur deuxième prêt solidaire. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO. La cliente N’GAKORO BAKO la première personne à partir de la gauche dans le rang assis n’est pas instruite, elle est actuellement vendeuse de divers. Elle compte acheter 25 kg de sucre, 1 paquet de pile, 1 carton de pâte alimentaire, 4 cartouches de thé et 5 paquets de sachet plastiques chez les grossistes au marché hebdomadaire. La vente se fait en détail et en espèce chez elle, a une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 11 000Fcfa par mois, qui sera utilisé pour assurer la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
The group Kolamban consists of married women who are on average 46 years old and have 4 children. They all live in traditional families in the village of Werekela, Guegneka commune, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region (second administrative region of the republic of Mali).

They met through family, neighborhood and friendship ties. They sell condiments, soap, coal, tubers, and a variety of items. The women of the group Kolamban are on their second group loan. With the goal of satisfying the enormous demand of their clientele, they have resorted to Soro Yiriwaso. The client N'Gakoro Bako, the first person from the left in the row of seated people, is not schooled and is actually a seller of a variety of items. She plans to buy 25kg of sugar, 1 package of batteries, 1 carton of nutritional paste, 4 cartons of tea and 5 packages of plastic bags at the wholesalers at the weekly market. She sells retail and for cash, to a mixed clientele. She plans to make a profit of 11,000 FCFA per month, which will be used to ensure the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy a variety of items.

loans.name: Elva Victorina

texts.es:
Elva de 72 años de edad, vive en un cantón,  está soltera y tiene 3 hijos, pero solo uno de ellos vive cerca de su casa y  trabaja como fontanero.
Ella tiene 5 años de trabajar en su propia tienda, ella se ha identificado por ser una mujer emprendedora que lucha por salir adelante, decidió colocar la tienda para obtener sus propios ingresos, dicha tienda está ubicada en su casa y está disponible a los clientes a partir de las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 6:00 de la tarde todos los días, en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad.

El dinero del crédito será invertido en la compra de productos para surtir la tienda, ya que en este momento es poco el inventario que tiene disponible para la venta,  entre los productos que comprará están; azúcar, frijoles, arroz, aceite, café, huevos, sodas, entre  otros.  

Su sueño es tener una variedad de productos, para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y mantenerse en el mercado hasta que Dios se lo permita, y con esto poder costearse sus gastos y además seguir surtiendo la tienda.
texts.en:
Elva, 72, lives in a district. She's single and has three children although only one of them lives near her home. He works as a plumber.

She has been working in her own shop for 5 years. She has been known as an enterprising woman who was struggling to get by so she decided to establish a shop to get her own income. The shop is located in her home and it is open to customers from 6 am to 6 pm daily. She sells staple products. 

The loan money will be invested in the purchase of goods to stock her store because she currently has little inventory for sale. Among the products she'll buy are sugar, beans, rice, cooking oil, coffee, eggs, sodas and more. 

Her dream is to have a variety of products to meet the needs of her customers and stay in business as long as God permits so she can afford her expenses and continue to earn money in her store.

loans.use: to stock her store with sugar, beans, rice, cooking oils, coffee, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy goods for his store, such as oil, rice, corn, cornflour, sugar, toilet paper, and fresh vegetables.

loans.name: Walter Enrrique

texts.es:
Walter de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, esta soltero y vive actualmente con su madre, su padre y sus dos hermanos. Él se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maiz, frijol y maicillo, de él dependen sus padres y un hermano que es especial.

El cliente se didica a la agricultura desde hace poco tiempo,  despues de sacar su bachillearto en vista que no tenian recursos para estudiar una carrera técnica, él decidio dedicarse a la agricultura lo aprendio de sus padres que siempre se han dedicado a la agricultura y con la ayuda de sus padres a podido sacar adelante su trabajo.

Su trabajo le queda a unas 3 cuadras de su casa y se va caminando, su horario es de 6am hasta las 12 del mediodia y por las tardes si alguien lo busca para que le vaya ayudar él va y de esa manera tiene otros ingresos.

Con el prestamo, podra  mejorar su vivienda ya que actualmente esta en malas condiciones, el techo esta roto y solo con unas láminas alcanso a cubrir una parte. Con este prestamo podra, comprar materiales para repararla y tenerla en mejores condiciones y tambien podra comprar mas insumos para la siembra que ya se aproxima.

Su sueño es cultivar cada vez mas  y hacer crecer su negocio, comercializando los granos en otros municipios y desea que su familia se supere y el poder en un futuro estudiar aunque sea un técnico.
texts.en:
Walter is 25 years old, finished his high school studies. He is single and currently lives with his mother, father, and two siblings. He works in agriculture sowing corn, beans and sorghum. His parents depend on him, as well as his brother who has special needs.

He started in agriculture a short time ago. After getting his high school qualification and seeing that he could not afford to study for a technical profession, he decided to go into agriculture, which he learned from his parents who always worked in agriculture. With the help of his parents he has been able to develop his trade.

Walter works 3 blocks away from his home, and he walks there. His schedule is from 6am - 12 noon and in the afternoons, if someone comes looking for help, he goes to help them so he can increase his income.

With the loan, he will be able to make improvements to his home, since it is currently in bad condition. The roof is broken and he has only managed to cover part of it with some laminate sheets. With this loan he will be able to buy materials to repair the roof and get it in better condition and also he will be able to buy more supplies for sowing, as the time is getting closer.

Walter's dream is to grow more and more crops and expand his business, selling grains in other towns. He also wants his family to excel and he wants to be able to study in the future in order to become a specialist.

loans.use: to repair the roof of his house and to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Martín

texts.es:
Martín tiene 76 años de edad, cuando era joven, solamente estudió dos años por las noches en su comunidad, pues donde residía, lamentablemente no habían centros de educación cercanos, el único que existía para esa época estaba demasiado lejos. Él está acompañado y tiene ocho hijos. 

Desde sus 10 años, comenzó a trabajar en la agricultura, fue su papá quien le enseñó esta actividad para ayudar a mantener a la familia que era de diez hermanos. 

Cuando él se acompañó, continuó trabajando en la agricultura con su pareja, con especies menores, ganado lechero y de engorde en pequeña escala. Él compra el ganado en la comunidad cercana a la que vive, tiene que caminar alrededor de una hora y media y traer el ganado hacia sus potreros. 

Martín posee una gran experiencia en el manejo de ganado, pues ha sido su trabajo desde muy joven. El  préstamo que solicita a CrediCampo, es para comprar dos vacas lecheras valoradas en $600 cada una y  concentrado para su alimentación.

Con la inversión, aumentará su pequeño hato ganadero, pues solo posee dos vacas y una novilla, espera obtener mejores ingresos económicos de la venta de leche y sus derivados, pues es un negocio muy conocido por él. 

Con estos ingresos, Martín sueña con mejorar su condición de vida y ayudar a su hija a continuar con sus estudios, ya que este es su último año en el instituto en el cual está estudiando. Sueña también con  aumentar el nímero de vacas, y de esta manera crecer en la produccion, tambien sueña con construir una habitación mas a su vivienda pues solo cuenta con una sala y una habitación.
texts.en:
Martín is 76 years old. When he was young, he only studied for two years at night in his community, since there were unfortunately no educational centers near where he lived. The only one that existed at that time was too far away. He has a partner and eight children.

From the time he was 10 years old, he has worked in agriculture. It was his father who taught him this activity in order to help support the family, which had ten siblings.

When he found his partner, he continued to work in agriculture with her, with small animals and dairy and beef cattle on a small scale. He buys the cattle in the community near where he lives. He has to walk about an hour and a half and bring the cattle to his pastures.

Martín has a great deal of experience in managing cattle, since it has been his job since he was very young. The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy two dairy cows valued at $600 each as well as feed for them.

With the investment, he will increase his small cattle herd, since he only has two cows and a heifer. He hopes to obtain better earnings from the sale of milk and its products, since it is a business he knows very well.

With these earnings, Martín dreams of improving his living conditions and of helping his daughter continue with her studies, since this is her last year at the school where she is studying. He also dreams of increasing the number of cows, thereby increasing production. He also dreams of building one more room on his house, since it only has a living room and a bedroom.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows as well as feed for them

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es:
Marvin de 30 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado, está acompañando y su pareja se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tienen un hijo de 5 años que ya comenzó a estudiar en parvularia.

Él se dedica al trabajo de marinero desde hace cuatro años, donde aborda un barco y se internan al mar por varios días para pescar, tuvo la oportunidad de iniciar a trabajar en esta empresa de pesca, cuando estaban contratando nuevo personal, su trabajo de marinero es una de las cosas que más le apasiona y ama en su vida, a pesar de que ello lo separa de su familia por varias semanas; pero reconoce que esta es la única forma con la cual puede obtener ingresos económicos  para ofrecerle buena estabilidad a su familia. 

El crédito le permitirá construir una habitación más en su casa, comprará materiales como bloque, cemento, arena, hierro, cerámica, lámina, madera y clavos, también el dinero del crédito le permitirá mejorar el resto de su casa y al mismo tiempo se sentirá más seguro y resguardado con su familia.

Sus sueños son, tener una buena casa, darle la sostenibilidad económica a su familia, brindarle la educación a su hijo ya que él lastimosamente no tuvo la oportunidad y le gustaría ver a su hijo graduado de una carrera universitaria, y además sueña con estar preparado para mantener a los hijos que puedan tener en un futuro.
texts.en:
Marvin, 30, studied until the 9th grade. He is married and his wife sells tortillas. They have a 5 year old son who attends preschool.

Marvin has earned his living as a fisherman for four years. He boards a ship and stays at sea for several days in order to make a catch. He had the opportunity to start working for a fishing company when they were hiring new staff. His work as a fisherman is one of the things he is most passionate about. He loves his work even though he is separated from his family for several weeks. He recognizes that this work is the only way that he can get an income to provide good stability to his family.

This loan will allow him to build an additional room onto his home. He will buy materials such as cinderblocks, cement, sand, iron, ceramic, wood, nails, and more so he can improve his home and feel that his family is more safe and secure. 

His dream is to have a good home, provide economic stability for his family, and provide an education to his son because he unfortunately had no chance to attend school himself. He would like to see his son graduate with a university degree and also dreams of being prepared to raise more children in the future.

loans.use: to add an additional room onto his house.

loans.name: Meyling Maria

texts.es: Meyling es originaria de la ciudad Somoto, casada y madre de cuatro hijos. Tiene 29 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y joyas de plata. Inicio su negocio hace 11 años, con la venta de sus prendas de oro y luego con el dinero obtenido logro comprar más productos, y es así como ha mantenido el negocio hasta el día de hoy. Su meta próxima es comprar un vehículo y utilizarlo como Taxi. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Ropa nueva, Ropa íntima, Prendas de plata entre otros. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá comprar mercadería y abastecer la demanda de sus clientes. Su plan futuro es comprar su propio tramo y lograr establecerse en un lugar fijo.
texts.en:
Meyling is originally from the city of Somoto. She is 29 years old, married, and the mother for four children.

Meyling is a merchant who sells new clothing and silver jewelry. She started her business 11 years ago by selling gold jewelry and later used the money she earned to buy more products. Meyling has been able to maintain her business to this point. Her next goal is to buy a vehicle that can be used as a taxi.

Meyling is requesting a loan in order to buy new clothes, lingerie, silver jewelry, and other items. She expects this loan to be of great help since she will be able to buy merchandise and satisfy the demand from her customers. Her future plans include buying her own plot of land so that she can be established in a fixed location.

loans.use: to buy new clothes, lingerie, silver jewelry, and other items.

loans.name: Ameera

texts.en: Ameera was born in 1993. She is married and lives with her husband and her only son in a sector in Jordan called Dairalla. She has been trying her best to assist her husband in improving their living conditions by running her project of selling blankets at her house for the past year. Now she needs to expand the business by buying a larger quantity of blankets to raise her profits, but she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more blankets for her business

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is 24 years old and from Nakuru. He is not yet married, but he takes care of his siblings.

He has been operating his business of motorcycle transport for the last three years and to enable him to buy another motorcycle, he has applied for his first loan of 20,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy another motorcycle. 

His monthly income right now is.10,000 KES and his plan is to open a savings account where he will save his money and buy a pick-up in the future, which he will use to transport goods to the market for his customers at a fee.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle for his business

loans.name: Honorine

texts.en: Honorine sells clothes and has been in the business for the past three years. She sells clothes and has requested the loan to buy more clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family and pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 41 years old, married, and together with her spouse they have been blessed with three children. She has an internet cafe business which she has been running for five years now. She also sells stationery items as well as provide computer services such as photocopying and typing. Her husband also provides additional income.

She will be using this loan to buy two computers and stationery items. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business and educate her children.

This is her second loan term with VisionFund Kenya and in future she hopes to expand her business to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy two computers and stationery

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es:
Teresa, es una mujer de 32 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene 3 hijos que estudian en la escuela, su nivel académico es muy bajo, ya que solo estudió hasta segundo grado, debido a que la escuela le quedaba muy lejos, únicamente sus hijos dependen de ella. 

Su mayor fuente de ingresos proviene del trabajo en la agricultura y de la crianza de aves, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años, pues es una de las mayores enseñanzas que le ha dado su madre.  

Teresa camina desde su casa, aproximadamente tres kilómetros para llegar al lugar donde cultiva, pues no hay transporte en la zona. Sus hijos y sus padres se involucran en el trabajo, su esposo la abandonó, pero ahora está acompañada con otra persona. 

Ella necesita este crédito, para construir una humilde vivienda cerca de donde vive su madre, ya que ella le ha dado una hectárea para poder construirla, y así tener una vivienda adecuada para sus hijos. 

Su sueño, es tener casa propia, en un ambiente agradable y sin complicaciones, asegurar el futuro de sus hijos para que tengan un lugar en el cual habitar, también sueña con que sus hijos estudien y sean grandes profesionales en la vida.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 32 year old woman. She has a partner and has 3 children who are at school. Her own academic level is very low, since she only studied up to second grade because the school was very far away. Only her children depend on her.

Her primary source of income comes from her work in agriculture and raising poultry. She has worked in this field for more than 10 years, since it is one of the main things she learnt from her mother.  

Teresa walks approximately 3km from her house to get to the place she cultivates, since there is no transport in the area. Her children and her parents help with the work. Her husband left her, but she now has a new partner.

She needs this loan in order to build a modest house near to where her mother lives, since she has given her a hectare in which to build, and so have a suitable home for her children.

Her dream is to have her own home, in a nice environment and without complications, to assure the future of her children so that they have a place to live. She also dreams of her children studying and becoming great professionals.

loans.use: to buy materials to construct her house.

loans.name: José Luís

texts.es:
José de 23 años de edad, es un joven que estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltero vive con tres tíos y el papá 


É trabaja como seguridad en una de las fronteras del país desde hace un año,  ya que no encontraba trabajo cuando salió de estudiar y le dijeron de esa plaza, el trabajo esta a una distancia de dos horas de camino en bus y tiene turno de 24 horas. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar pilones y lamina para la casa que con mucho esfuerzo esta  construyendo.  

Los sueños que tiene es hacer una casa muy bonita, para cuando decida casarse, ya tener donde vivir y primero Dios le permita estar ahí trabajando para tener siempre ese ingreso, manifiesta José.
texts.en:
José, 23 years old, is a young person who studied through high school. He is single and lives with three uncles and his father.

He has worked as a security guard at one of the country's borders for a year, since he did not find work when he left school and they told him about this post. The work is two hours away by bus and he has a 24-hour shift.

The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy posts and roofing sheets for the house he is building with great effort.

José says that the dreams he has are to build a very pretty house, so that when he decides to marry he will already have a place to live, and first of all that God lets him be there working in order to always have that income.

loans.use: to buy posts and roofing sheets for the house he is building with great effort

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 32 years old and a single mother of one child aged 7,  whom she supports.  She owns a beauty salon in the town of Kabarnet and has been in this business for a period of 3 years, earning a monthly income of 29,000 KES.

She has borrowed her first term loan of 30,000 KES from Visionfund Kenya and wishes to use this amount to purchase beauty products for her salon.  The anticipated income will be used to provide a better education for her child.

Her dream is to expand her current business and own a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products for her salon

loans.name: Koitumet

texts.en:
Koitumet is a 39 years old gentleman, married to Naituyang, and has children aged between 5 - 17. He has been running a motorcycle transport business for the last seven years. 

He learned about vision fund through an existing customer. He has borrowed a first loan of 20,000 KES which he will use to purchase livestock for fattenning and resell in the quest of diversifying his business. This will earn him more income as well as engage the family in an economic activity. 

He will use the proceeds to educate his children. His dream is to uplift the family's living standards.

loans.use: to diversify his business to livestock farming
